channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description:
Yes. https://t.co/fkYJxSBMI2
they should go to russia.
We need to be more like Ukraine. https://t.co/47xyTUDq9P
Ukrainian authorities say citizens don't need to declare captured Russian tanks and military equipment for tax purposes. https://t.co/fENwR6v711
@pauleberry @navybook and since you like it, spread the word! not enough people use it. ;-)
I use https://t.co/KAVhNd06pG to write my twitter threads.

1/3 When we look back on Tesla if we manage to avoid all the calamities that are lined up, I'm sure it'll be one of the most influential products of our time.
2/3 Without Tesla the auto manufacturers that Biden praises wouldn't have the guts or vision to develop the cars they are now preparing to sell.
3/3 There are always politeness experts around to say how they want their revolution to be nicely scented, but it doesn't work that way. You will be offended by the ideas that shake your world. You'll get over it too.
Jon Batiste: National Anthem. https://t.co/YtbSJMoY9i
@navybook @pauleberry https://t.co/KAVhNcIv16
Inside Veselka: A Restaurant Rallying Point for Ukraine. https://t.co/aMMTFAcQOb
The Polestar O2 is a sleek electric roadster with an integrated drone for aerial filming. https://t.co/i285qqxK6T

Elon Musk takes aim at President Biden after he fails to mention Tesla during State of the Union. https://t.co/zQOMhQBwFW
I bought a Tesla, and I vote for Biden.
Gotta say itâ€™s bullshit for a political leader to be so openly biased against an important American company.
Taylor Lorenz on the New York Times and Smear Campaigns. https://t.co/ecaJ1W5ZlK

NYT front page from May 8, 2020. https://t.co/3xeWlQ9Wtq
Also from May 2021. https://t.co/XGCxiTI5mA
@mims in other words that generation is illiterate. ;-)

@markos That was exactly what GHW Bush did, he should have gotten the Nobel Peace prize. It didn't last, subsequent administrations really did a number on Russia, forgetting they have a vast nuclear arsenal.
@scobleizer -- I use Amazon Music. Anyway I notice they now have Dolby Atmos. I have an iPhone 13 Pro and AirPod Pro. Am I getting the full Scobleizer treatment or do I have to get Apple Music too?

Imagine a peace conference in a few weeks, with the Ukraine and Russia, the EU, NATO and of course the US. One thing the US wants is to be sure Russia stays out of our elections in the future, maybe some reparations for the damage they did in 2016. That has not been settled.
@AndreaBNYC @MaraGay Indeed. Some news org should rewrite the story of the 2016 election given all we know now about Putin and Ukraine that we didn't know then.
Write plain text files. (BTW, there is a text file format for hierarchies, called OPML.) https://t.co/rDyK8Zxd7M
Do you think Boris Johnson works for Pooootin?

Jimmy Carter says Trump only won the election because Russia 'interfered on his behalf.' https://t.co/zMAHottUrq
Donâ€™t forget Putin interferes in our elections.
